thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Greer Katarina
thread.title_full: Smith & Noble reviewed by Greer Katarina

author: Greer Katarina
title: Greer Katarina
text: I have nothing but praise for the professionalism of the company. I worked with Lori M in the Cleveland/Akron area. She gave me great design advice, helped me replace of one of the blinds that got damaged in the shipping process. Communication with the design team, installers as well as customer service was seamless.
